title.native: 戦国妖狐 千魔混沌編
title.english: Sengoku Youko: The Thousandfold Chaos Arc

description: The second and third cours of Sengoku Youko, adapting the "Thousandfold Chaos" arc.

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Cultivation
tags.description: Features characters using training, often martial arts-related, and other special methods to cultivate qi (a component of traditional Chinese philosophy, described as "life force") and gain strength or immortality.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

title.native: 戦国妖狐
戦国妖狐

node.description: [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekogaeru)

**Height:** 173cm

[Website](https://hiroki773.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hirokinanami773) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/hirokinanami773/)

She joined Takarazuka Revue in 2003 and was assigned to *Cosmos Troupe*. In 2015, she was transferred to *Star Troupe*, where she stayed until her resignation in 2019. Her last performance was *ESTRELLAS*.

__[Profile (Lantis)](http://www.lantis.jp/artist/stereodivefoundation/bio.html)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Stereo Dive Foundation__ is the solo sound making project of Japanese musician [Ryuuta Iida](https://anilist.co/staff/106037), otherwise known as Ron (stylized as R・O・N)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/krmszm_cat)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.

Miu Miyamoto is an art director and background artist.

**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

__Residency:__ Hino City, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Berklee College of Music (Department of Film Scoring)

[Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/evancall) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/evan.call.33) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0nMGbTpPx4b3h5fMG9CpWJ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/realevancall)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tanpopokingdom)

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__
